pros: * Working from home * Opportunities for development * Living by my own ethos and values. * A real sense of purpose. The desire to make a difference is what drives many people to work for a charity * Like-minded people * Fantastic holiday and flexibility * Mental health days * Opportunities to better your own mental health by having access to resources and wellbeing sessions. * Friendships - although we all work from home, I feel that I have personally made so many lifelong friends here.
cons: It can be emotional working with vulnerable people sometimes. However, the management are always available to speak to and will give you time to yourself if you have struggled with something particular.

review_title: Incredible charity, changing and saving lives.
pros: Inspiring, authentic, lived experience, caring, understanding, supportive, inclusive,
cons: needs more funding to reach more people.
